metadata.title: LE TATCHE BOIS - Artisan Woodworking Workshop in Morocco
metadata.description: Traditional Moroccan woodworking workshop. Custom doors, windows, furniture crafted from noble woods. Delivery throughout Morocco.
metadata.keywords: moroccan woodwork, artisan furniture, custom wood doors, handcrafted furniture

slide2.title: Custom Furniture
slide2.subtitle: Each piece tells a unique story

cta.title: Bring Your Wood Ideas to Life
cta.description: Our team of skilled craftsmen is ready to create the perfect piece for your space. From design to installation, we guide you every step of the way.

about.title: The Art of Moroccan Woodworking
about.description: Since 1995, LE TATCHE BOIS has been carrying on the ancestral traditions of Moroccan craftsmanship while embracing innovation.
about.description1: Since 1995, LE TATCHE BOIS has been carrying on the ancestral traditions of Moroccan craftsmanship while embracing innovation. Our family workshop brings together master craftsmen passionate about their trade.
about.description2: Every piece we create is unique, shaped with love and respect for traditional techniques, while meeting modern standards of quality and durability.

features.feature1: Skilled craftsmen with over 25 years of experience
features.feature2: Noble woods carefully selected with the greatest care
features.customDesc: Every project is as unique as you

featuredProducts.title: Featured Products
featuredProducts.subtitle: Handcrafted pieces ready to enhance your interior

servicesPreview.title: What We Offer
servicesPreview.subtitle: Custom solutions for all your woodworking needs

doors.title: Doors
doors.description: Entrance, interior and traditional Moroccan doors

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Client satisfaction is our greatest pride

testimonials.testimonial1: Exceptional work! The doors of our riad are true works of art. The team captured the essence of traditional Moroccan craftsmanship.
testimonials.testimonial2: Professionalism and creativity delivered. The custom furniture exceeds all our expectations. I highly recommend LE TATCHE BOIS.
testimonials.testimonial3: A trusted partner for our hotel projects. Impeccable quality and respect for deadlines. A collaboration we happily renew.
testimonials.testimonial4: Passionate craftsmen who transformed our ideas into reality. The carved ceiling is magnificent, our clients are amazed.

about.title: Our Workshop
about.subtitle: A passion passed down through generations

hero.title: The Art of Moroccan Woodworking
hero.subtitle: Discover the history and craftsmanship of LE TATCHE BOIS

story.title: A Family Passion
story.imageAlt: LE TATCHE BOIS founder in his workshop
story.content1: Founded in 1995 by Mohammed El Amrani, LE TATCHE BOIS was born from a deep passion for woodworking and Moroccan craftsmanship. What started as a small family workshop has become a benchmark in artisan woodworking in Morocco today.
story.content2: Every piece we create tells a story, one of expertise passed down through generations, enriched by modern innovations while preserving the authenticity of traditional Moroccan techniques.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To create exceptional wooden works that combine the elegance of contemporary design with the richness of traditional Moroccan craftsmanship, while respecting the environment and valuing the work of our artisans.

founding.title: Workshop Founded
founding.description: Mohammed El Amrani founded LE TATCHE BOIS with a vision: to perpetuate the art of Moroccan woodworking.

firstBigProject.title: First Major Project
firstBigProject.description: Completion of woodwork for a historic riad in Marrakech, marking our entry into large-scale projects.

expansion.title: Workshop Expansion
expansion.description: Workshop expansion and integration of new technologies while preserving our artisanal methods.

anniversary.title: 25 Years of Excellence
anniversary.description: Celebration of our jubilee with over 500 completed projects and a team of 15 skilled artisans.

today.title: Today
today.description: LE TATCHE BOIS continues to innovate, combining tradition and modernity for unique creations.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide every creation

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Rigorous selection of the finest woods and impeccable finishes for lasting creations.

craftsmanship.title: Craftsmanship
craftsmanship.description: Artisanal techniques passed down through generations, enriched by experience.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Contemporary design integrating the latest technologies while respecting tradition.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: Commitment to eco-responsible practices and use of certified woods.

team.title: Passionate Craftsmen
team.subtitle: A team dedicated to excellence and customer satisfaction

workshop.title: The Workshop
workshop.subtitle: Where magic happens, between tradition and modernity

cta.title: Want to Discover Our Workshop?
cta.description: Come visit us and discover our craftsmanship in action. Our artisans will be happy to welcome you.

hero.title: Our Woodworking Services
hero.subtitle: From custom furniture to traditional doors, we create unique pieces combining ancestral craftsmanship with contemporary design.

services.title: What We Do
services.subtitle: Complete woodworking solutions for all your projects

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Custom solutions for all your projects

portes.title: Wooden Doors
portes.description: Entry doors, interior doors, closet doors. Hand-carved solid wood with traditional Moroccan patterns or modern designs.

fenetres.title: Windows & Shutters
fenetres.description: Double-glazed wooden windows, swing or sliding shutters, traditional mashrabiya. Optimal thermal and acoustic insulation.

mobilier.title: Custom Furniture
mobilier.description: Tables, chairs, wardrobes, bookcases, beds. Unique furniture created to your dimensions and style. Noble wood and fine finishes.

escaliers.title: Stairs & Railings
escaliers.description: Straight, turning or spiral stairs. Carved railings, solid wood balusters. Classic or contemporary design.

plafonds.title: Wooden Ceilings
plafonds.description: Traditional Moroccan carved cedar ceilings, wooden false ceilings, decorative beams. Warm atmosphere guaranteed.

restauration.title: Restoration & Repair
restauration.description: Antique furniture restoration, door and window repair, wood treatment against insects and humidity.

doors.title: Doors
doors.description: Entry doors, interior doors, and traditional Moroccan doors

process.title: Our Process
process.subtitle: From design to installation, we guide you every step

consultation.title: Free Consultation
consultation.description: We discuss your project, take measurements on-site and listen to your needs to create the perfect solution.

design.title: Design & Quote
design.description: Our craftsmen create detailed plans with wood and finish choices. You receive a transparent quote with no surprises.

fabrication.title: Artisanal Crafting
fabrication.description: Each piece is handcrafted in our workshop by master carpenters with over 30 years of experience.

installation.title: Delivery & Installation
installation.description: We deliver and install your creation with care. On-site finishing and cleaning included. 2-year warranty.

step1.title: Consultation
step1.description: Discussion of your needs and preferences

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our services

delays.question: What are the production times?
delays.answer: Times vary depending on project complexity. Allow 2-3 weeks for a simple door, 4-6 weeks for custom furniture, and 2-3 months for a complete kitchen. We give you a precise timeline with your quote.

woodTypes.question: What types of wood do you use?
woodTypes.answer: We mainly work with Atlas cedar, oak, walnut, mahogany and thuya. Each wood has its characteristics: cedar for its fragrance and resistance, oak for durability, walnut for elegance.

deliveryZone.question: Do you deliver throughout Morocco?
deliveryZone.answer: Yes, we deliver throughout Morocco. Delivery is free in Fes and surrounding areas. For other cities, transport fees apply based on distance and volume.

howToQuote.question: How do I request a quote?
howToQuote.answer: You can request a free quote via our online form, by phone at +212 698 013 468, or by visiting our showroom. Send us your dimensions and photos for a more accurate quote.

warranty.question: What warranty do you offer?
warranty.answer: All our work is guaranteed for 2 years parts and labor. This warranty covers manufacturing defects and wood-related issues. We also offer responsive after-sales service.

customDesign.question: Can you reproduce an existing model?
customDesign.answer: Absolutely! Send us photos of the model you like and we'll faithfully reproduce it or adapt it to your wishes. We also create 100% original designs.

payment.question: What are the payment terms?
payment.answer: We require a 40% deposit on order, 40% at mid-production, and the 20% balance on delivery. We accept bank transfers and cash payment.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Space?
cta.description: Contact us for a free consultation. Our craftsmen are here to bring your wood projects to life.

banner.title: We use cookies
banner.description: This site uses cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze traffic, and personalize content.

modal.title: Cookie Settings
modal.description: Choose which cookies you want to accept. Necessary cookies are always active as they are essential for the site to function.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: Essential for the website to function properly. They enable navigation, access to secure areas, and the shopping cart.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors use the site by collecting anonymous data to improve our services.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to display relevant advertisements and measure the effectiveness of our advertising campaigns.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: How we collect, use, and protect your personal data

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: LE TATCHE BOIS is committed to protecting the privacy of its customers and visitors. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information when you use our website and services.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect different types of information to provide and improve our services.

personal.title: Personal Data
personal.content: Name, email address, phone number, postal address, payment information when you place an order or request a quote.

automatic.title: Automatically Collected Data
automatic.content: IP address, browser type, pages visited, visit duration, cookies and similar technologies data.

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.content: Your personal data is used for the following purposes:
dataUsage.purposes: Processing and delivering your orders • Responding to your quote requests • Communication regarding your order • Improving our services • Sending newsletters (with your consent) • Compliance with legal obligations

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We never sell your personal data. We may share it with trusted partners (carriers, payment processors) only as part of providing our services. These partners are contractually required to protect your data.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, modification, disclosure, or destruction. Payments are secured via Stripe with SSL encryption.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: In accordance with GDPR and Moroccan law 09-08, you have the following rights:
yourRights.rights: Right of access to your data • Right to rectification • Right to erasure • Right to restriction of processing • Right to data portability • Right to object

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve your experience. Please see our Cookie Policy for more details on the types of cookies used and how to manage them.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any questions about this policy or to exercise your rights, contact us at: contact@letatchebois.com or by mail at: LE TATCHE BOIS, Lot Hamane El Fetouaki N°365, Lamhamid, Marrakech, Morocco. Phone: +212 698 013 468

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.description: The terms and conditions governing the use of our services and purchase of our products

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By placing an order on letatchebois.com, you unreservedly accept these general terms and conditions of sale. These conditions govern all relationships between LE TATCHE BOIS and its customers.

definitions.title: Definitions
definitions.content: "The Seller" refers to LE TATCHE BOIS, an artisan woodworking company. "The Customer" refers to any natural or legal person placing an order. "The Site" refers to the website letatchebois.com. "The Products" refers to items offered for sale.

products.title: Products
products.content: Our products are handcrafted in Morocco using quality woods.

description.title: Product Description
description.content: Photos and descriptions are as accurate as possible. However, wood being a natural material, slight variations in color or grain may exist.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.content: Prices are shown in Moroccan dirhams (MAD) including all taxes. We reserve the right to modify prices at any time, but products will be billed at the price in effect at the time of order validation.

orders.title: Orders
orders.content: Any order implies acceptance of these T&Cs. After validation, a confirmation email will be sent. We reserve the right to refuse an order in case of prior dispute or payment issues.

payment.title: Payment
payment.content: Payment can be made by the following methods:
payment.methods: Credit card (via Stripe, secure payment) • Cash on delivery (available in Morocco only) • Bank transfer

delivery.title: Delivery
delivery.content: Delivery times are indicative. A delay cannot give rise to cancellation unless mutually agreed. Risks are transferred to the buyer upon handover to the carrier. Check the package condition upon receipt.

returns.title: Returns and Exchanges
returns.content: You have 14 days after receipt to return an unused standard product in its original packaging. Custom or personalized products are not eligible for return unless there is a manufacturing defect.

warranty.title: Warranty
warranty.content: Our products benefit from the legal warranty of conformity (2 years) and the warranty against hidden defects. This warranty does not cover normal wear, damage due to misuse, or modifications made to the product.

liability.title: Liability
liability.content: LE TATCHE BOIS cannot be held liable for indirect damages related to the use of its products. Our liability is limited to the order amount.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All site content (texts, images, logos, designs) is the exclusive property of LE TATCHE BOIS. Any reproduction without written authorization is prohibited.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These T&Cs are governed by Moroccan law. In case of dispute, an amicable solution will be sought. Failing that, the courts of Marrakech will have jurisdiction.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any questions: contact@letatchebois.com | Phone: +212 698 013 468 | Address: Lot Hamane El Fetouaki N°365, Lamhamid, Marrakech, Morocco

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.description: How we use cookies and similar technologies on our site

whatAreCookies.title: What are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: A cookie is a small text file stored on your device when you visit a website. Cookies allow the site to remember your actions and preferences over a period of time.

types.title: Types of Cookies Used
types.content: We use different types of cookies on our site:

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.content: Necessary for site operation. They enable navigation, access to secure areas, and the shopping cart. Without these cookies, the site cannot function properly.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.content: Allow remembering your preferences (language, currency, region) to personalize your experience on the site.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.content: Help us understand how visitors use the site by collecting anonymous information. This data allows us to improve our services.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.content: Used to track visitors across websites to display relevant ads. We currently do not use this type of cookie.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Cookies
howWeUse.purposes: Maintain your login session • Remember your cart contents • Save your language and currency preferences • Analyze site traffic • Improve site performance

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.content: Some cookies are placed by third-party services like Stripe (secure payment) or analytics tools. These partners have their own privacy policies which we encourage you to review.

manageCookies.title: Managing Your Cookies
manageCookies.content: You can control and manage cookies in several ways:
manageCookies.instructions: Via your browser settings • Using our consent banner • By deleting existing cookies. Note that disabling certain cookies may affect your experience on the site.

consent.title: Your Consent
consent.content: On your first visit, a banner asks for your consent for non-essential cookies. You can change your preferences at any time via the link at the bottom of the page.

updates.title: Updates
updates.content: This policy may be updated. The last modification date is indicated at the top of the page. We encourage you to check this page regularly.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any questions about our use of cookies: contact@letatchebois.com

shipping.title: Shipping and Returns
shipping.description: Information about our delivery methods, times, and return policy

shippingZones.title: Shipping Zones
shippingZones.content: We deliver to the following areas:

morocco.title: Morocco
morocco.content: Delivery available in all Moroccan cities. Major cities (Casablanca, Rabat, Marrakech, Fès, Tangier) benefit from shorter delivery times.

international.title: International
international.content: Delivery possible to Europe, Middle East, and other destinations upon request. Contact us for a custom quote including customs fees.

deliveryTimes.title: Delivery Times
deliveryTimes.content: Delivery times vary depending on destination and product type:
deliveryTimes.times: In-stock products (Morocco): 5-7 business days • Express delivery (Morocco): 2-3 business days • Custom products: 2-4 weeks depending on complexity • International: 10-21 business days

shippingCosts.title: Shipping Costs
shippingCosts.content: Standard Morocco delivery: 50-150 MAD depending on size and weight. Express delivery: 80 MAD supplement. Workshop pickup: FREE. Free delivery on orders over 3000 MAD (Morocco only).

tracking.title: Order Tracking
tracking.content: An email with the tracking number is sent upon shipment. Track your package in real-time on our tracking page or directly on the carrier's website.

deliveryIssues.title: Delivery Issues
deliveryIssues.content: Upon receipt, check the package condition. In case of visible damage, refuse the package or note reservations on the delivery slip. Contact us within 48h with supporting photos.

conditions.title: Return Conditions
conditions.content: Standard products: return within 14 days • Unused item in original packaging • Custom products: non-returnable unless defective • Return shipping at customer's expense unless our error

process.title: Return Process
process.content: 1. Contact us by email with your order number. 2. Wait for our confirmation and instructions. 3. Carefully package the product. 4. Ship with a tracking number.

refunds.title: Refunds
refunds.content: Refund is processed within 14 days after receipt and verification of the returned product. Refund is made via the same payment method used for the purchase.

exchanges.title: Exchanges
exchanges.content: Exchange is possible under the same conditions as returns. Price difference will be adjusted. Contact us to arrange the exchange.

customOrders.title: Custom Orders
customOrders.content: Custom-made or personalized products cannot be returned or refunded, except in case of proven manufacturing defect. A 50% deposit is required at order.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: Customer service: contact@letatchebois.com | Phone: +212 698 013 468 | Monday to Saturday, 8am-6pm
